mart_holidays_2019_us.description: The United Nations' (UN) International Day of Persons with Disabilities is annually observed on December 3 to re-affirm and draw attention to the rights of people who live with disabilities.

mart_holidays_2019_us.name: World Soil Day
mart_holidays_2019_us.description: World Soil Day raises awareness of why soil is needed for sustainable living.

mart_holidays_2019_us.name: International Volunteer Day for Economic and Social Development
mart_holidays_2019_us.description: The United Nations’ (UN) International Volunteer Day for Economic and Social Development, also known as International Volunteer Day (IVD), is observed on December 5 each year.

mart_holidays_2019_us.name: St Nicholas Day
mart_holidays_2019_us.description: Some churches in the United States recognize St Nicholas' Day as a feast day.

mart_holidays_2019_us.name: Pearl Harbor Remembrance Day
mart_holidays_2019_us.description: National Pearl Harbor Remembrance Day remembers those who died or were injured when Pearl Harbor, in Hawaii, was attacked in 1941.

mart_holidays_2019_us.name: International Civil Aviation Day
mart_holidays_2019_us.description: International Civil Aviation Day is observed globally on December 7 each year. It is observed by organizations such as the International Civil Aviation Organization (ICAO).

mart_holidays_2019_us.name: World Genocide Commemoration Day

mart_holidays_2019_us.name: International Anti-Corruption Day
mart_holidays_2019_us.description: The United Nations’ (UN) International Anti-Corruption Day is annually observed on December 9 to raise public awareness of corruption and ways to fight it.

mart_holidays_2019_us.name: Green Monday
mart_holidays_2019_us.description: The last Monday at least ten days before Christmas has been dubbed “Green Monday” by online marketers.

mart_holidays_2019_us.name: Feast of the Immaculate Conception

mart_holidays_2019_us.description: The United Nations' (UN) International Mountain Day is an occasion to help raise awareness of the people who live in mountainous regions and the role that these regions play in providing food, water, and recreation. It is observed on December 11 each year.

mart_holidays_2019_us.name: Super Saturday
